refnamediv.refpurpose: pretty-prints an xml-term into an XML document

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The pp-xml-doc utility is used to pretty-print an ATerm containing an xml-doc term into a plain XML document.

refsection.title: Example
refsection.para: Assume the following xml-doc term is in the file doc.trm.
refsection.programlisting: Document( Prologue( Some(XMLDecl(VersionDecl(Version("1.0")), None, None)) , [] , None ) , Element( QName(None, "foo") , [Attribute(QName(None, "bar"), DoubleQuoted([Literal("zap")]))] , [ Text([Literal("\n ")]) , EmptyElement(QName(None, "znip"), []) , Text([Literal("\n")]) ] , QName(None, "foo") ) , Epilogue([]) )
